colour.models.dataset.ekta_space_ps5 Module¶

Ekta Space PS 5 Colourspace¶

Defines the Ekta Space PS 5 colourspace:

  • EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces IPython Notebook

References

[1]Holmes, J. (n.d.). Ekta Space PS 5. Retrieved from http://www.josephholmes.com/Ekta_Space.zip
colour.models.dataset.ekta_space_ps5.EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.69473684, 0.30526316], [ 0.26 , 0.7 ], [ 0.10972851, 0.00452489]])¶

Ekta Space PS 5 colourspace primaries.

EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.dataset.ekta_space_ps5.EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_V_ILLUMINANT = u'D50'¶

Ekta Space PS 5 colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_V_ILLUMINANT : unicode

EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_WHITEPOINT : tuple

colour.models.dataset.ekta_space_ps5.EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 5.94225061e-01, 2.72962901e-01, 9.70240322e-02], [ 2.61098890e-01, 7.34900119e-01, 4.00099102e-03], [ 4.74800172e-17, 4.19942925e-02, 7.83193992e-01]])¶

Ekta Space PS 5 colourspace to CIE XYZ tristimulus values matrix.

EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_TO_XYZ_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)

colour.models.dataset.ekta_space_ps5.XYZ_TO_EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_MATRIX = array([[ 2.00374294, -0.73027606, -0.24449803], [-0.71210742, 1.62065826, 0.07993842], [ 0.03818268, -0.08689852, 1.27253663]])¶

XYZ_TO_EKTA_SPACE_PS_5_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)
